name: Quest to conquer: Roots
description:
You have to retrieve an axe for the kind NPC at the start of the game. He wants you to get the Mighty Axe to get rid of the evil roots.
The point of the game is to unlock abilities to progress across the roots until you reach the Axe.

The game is finishable in this current state.

Team:
Lionel JANIN
Christophe FRACHEBOUD
Killian PEREZ
Flavien MERITTO

Credits:

  • Graphic assets come from kenney.nl.
  • Sound assets come from here.
